instructionTimer: The countdown timer at the top of the screen will display the remaining time available for you to complete the examination.
instructionPalette: The Question Palette displayed on the right side of the screen will show the status of each question using symbols.
instructionPaletteNav: You can navigate from one question to another using the Question Palette.
instructionSaveNext: Click on <1>Save and Next</1> to save your answer and move to the next question.
instructionSelect: To select an answer, click on the corresponding option.
instructionDeselect: To deselect an answer, click on the "Clear Response" button.
instructionChange: To change your answer, click on a different option.
instructionSectionNav: After clicking <1>Save and Next</1> on the last question in a section, youâ€™ll move to the next section automatically.
instructionCoding: For <1>Coding Questions</1>, click <2>Submit Code</2> or the question will be marked as unattempted.
declaration: I have read and understood the instructions. All computer hardware allotted to me is in proper working condition. I declare that I am not in possession of or using any prohibited gadget like a mobile phone, Bluetooth device, or any material not allowed inside the examination hall.
